about.summary: Swiss German University (SGU) was established in 2000 with Indonesian–German–Swiss–Austrian collaboration. It pioneers international curricula in Indonesia with English-medium instruction and double-degree paths with European partners.
about.vision: To be a globally recognized university with integrity, superior learning culture, diversity, and high social responsibility.
